emuInput.TitMainTitle: Har-Brack High School football players, including no. 20 Jim Powell, no. 30 Chester "Cookie" Gilchrist, and no. 41 Barry Johnson, posed in formation on field, Natrona Heights, Pennsylvania
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 28, 1953, pg. 27, reads: "Har-Brack's Best - When Donora goes against Har-Brack at the Pitt Stadium Saturday afternoon for the Class AA WPIAL football championship, it will have the unenviable job of stopping three of the most feared runners in high school circles.  The lads, shown above, are, left to right: Jim Powell, 190-pound halfback; Barry Johnson, 170-pound halfback, and Chester Gilchrist, the WPIAL's most devastating runner who weighs 210. - Harris Photo."
